title: Better Place

description.plain:
“Better Place” is the lead single of the Trolls Band Together Soundtrack, performed by the popular ‘90s boy band *NSYNC. This is their first song together after a lengthy hiatus of 22 years.

Band member Justin Timberlake voices one of the main protagonists Branch in the Trolls film series. Along with “Better Place,” he also wrote the lead singles for the previous Trolls soundtracks, such as the global smash hit “Can’t Stop The Feeling!” and “The Other Side” featuring SZA.

embed_content: Read “Better Place” by *NSYNC on Genius
